thread.section_title: Easy Comforts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Comforts | www.easycomforts.com
thread.title: PATRICIA BURKHALTER
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by PATRICIA BURKHALTER

author: PATRICIA BURKHALTER
title: PATRICIA BURKHALTER
text:
The only problem I encountered was going through the automated reply. I needed to converse with someone, but I was only allowed to answer the questions from your end.
The young man, Tom, who handled the shipping problem of the original order could not have done a better job. I was completely happy with his resolution and your company.
